name: Wealth of Knowledge
description:
Wealth of Knowledge is a game that places the players in a game-show-esque atmosphere with some characteristics of a casino.

The goal is for the players to gamble on their ability to obtain the most money by retaining the most information under pressure to be the last one standing.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A game for 3-6 players.

Multiple decks of genre/category cards filled with various facts.

Players bet on their ability to memorize a chosen amount of cards within a certain period of time.

A judge (can be a player) will then ask a question for each card that the player picks up.

If the player answers all the questions correctly, they will be rewarded, if not they have to give the money to the bank.

Game is over when there is only 1 player left, or whichever player reaches $5000 first.
